Sequence Information.Function: Binds to the lipid A moiety of bacterial lipopolysaccharides (LPS), a glycolipid present in the outer membrane of all Gram-negative bacteria. Shows a potent antimicrobial activity against the Gram-negative bacteria E.coli, S.typhimurium and P.aeruginosa. Less active against the Gram-positive bacteria S.aureus, L.monocytogenes and B.subtilis.

Literature.Title: Purification and properties of proline-rich antimicrobial peptides from sheep and goat leukocytes.
Literature.Author: Kokryakov V.N.,Nguyen T.,Zhao C.,Brogden K.A.,Shamova O.
